companies.name: Cognizant
companies.author: Cognizant
companies.content: I have extensive experience in several technologies and have been working on deliverables since I was in training. Have a look:
bullets: Designed and developed a component generator using Angular, while pair programming, which allowed creation of components dynamically, from configuration files, ensuring delivery of user stories in 2 months rather than 5+ months.
Lead a team of 4 members, for integration of recurly payment gateway in an Angular project.
Created an efficient reorderable hierarchy viewer component in Angular that replaced a clunky UI involving several clicks spread across several tabs.
Was a vital part of VR & AR founders team and got awarded for my contributions which spanned across several projects including the famed Midwifery Project for The University of Newcastle, Australia.
